name: bitSlap (itch)
description:
bitSlap is the hottest new fighting game on the market. Massive, hard hitting beats, with massive, harder hitting slaps. This two player game requires rhythm, timing, and special moves in order to drain your opponent's life bar to zero. Fight as Granny or the Bear. Will you be the champion?

Controls:

Bear (P1):

- WASD for note hitting

- Q to use special

Granny (P2):

- Arrows for note hitting

- Right Shift to use special
